description:
Short, blonde haired, and one of Zeus` most trusted officials. He is unhappy about the Six Saint Beast living in the Zeus` villa since he is afraid that they might steal Zeus` attention and affection away from him, thus his position is in peril. Judas assured him that that is not the case and Pandora denies feeling so.
Attribute: Water
Ability: Hypnotism
Image Color: Olive
name: Shinkan Pandora
